query:
SELECT 
  po.id,
  po.orderNumber,
  po.tenantId,
  po.customerName,
  po.totalItems,
  po.totalQuantity,
  po.status,
  po.createdAt,
  COUNT(poi.id) as actual_items_count
FROM pickingOrders po
LEFT JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
WHERE po.orderNumber = 'PK1768164982891'
GROUP BY po.id;
